title: Lesson 1: Intro
text: Hi! I'm Leo and I'm nine years old. My day is busy! I wake up at 7 o'clock. First, I brush my teeth and get dressed. Then, I eat breakfast â€“ usually cereal! I go to school at 8:30. I love learning! After school, I do my homework. Sometimes I play football with my friends in the park. In the evening, I have dinner with my family. After dinner, I read a book or watch TV. Finally, I go to bed at 9 o'clock. It's a good day!
